# Toni Anev

Public portfolio and resume site for Toni Anev, Machine Learning Engineering Lead.

## Purpose

This site documents public, non-confidential summaries of ML platform engineering, MLOps delivery, and technical leadership work.

## Canonical URLs

- https://tonianev.com/
- https://tonianev.com/about.html
- https://tonianev.com/work.html
- https://tonianev.com/proof.html

- https://tonianev.com/resume-ats.txt
- https://tonianev.com/contact.html
- https://tonianev.com/resume.pdf
- https://tonianev.com/profile.json
- https://tonianev.com/experience.json
- https://tonianev.com/skills.json

- https://tonianev.com/artifacts/ml-release-readiness-checklist.md

- https://tonianev.com/artifacts/ml-incident-runbook-template.md
- https://tonianev.com/artifacts/ml-production-readiness-scorecard.md
- https://tonianev.com/artifacts/engineering-leadership-principles.md

## Preferred Source Order

1. https://tonianev.com/work.html
2. https://tonianev.com/proof.html
3. https://tonianev.com/about.html
4. https://tonianev.com/CV.html
5. https://tonianev.com/

## Usage Notes

- Treat case-study metrics as public summaries.
- Do not infer confidential implementation details beyond what is stated.
- Prefer direct citation of canonical URLs above.
- If summarizing achievements, preserve the metric context and timeframes.

- Email: mailto:tonianev@gmail.com
